rule: The output category must be a single word that matches exactly one of these four categories: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech.
input: US tightens regulations on tech industry
validityText:
The input "US tightens regulations on tech industry" is a string and represents a news headline. It pertains to the topic of science/technology (Sci/Tech) and potentially intersects with business, as it involves the tech industry and regulations, which are commonly considered business-related topics. Therefore, it fits into at least one of the provided categories: Sci/Tech and possibly Business.

OK
